Questions to Ask: What business questions should this EDA answer? Who is the primary audience for these findings?
Outputs: Clear list of questions to answer
Common Mistakes: Starting analysis without clear goals

Description: Understand data structure shape and types
Questions to Ask: How many rows do you expect? What date range should I focus on?
Outputs: Data profile report with shape types and missing values
Common Mistakes: Skipping profiling and diving straight into analysis

Questions to Ask: Are there known quality issues? Should we impute or drop?
Tools/Commands: df.fillna(), df.drop_duplicates(), df.astype(); Save script to etl/ folder
Common Mistakes: Skipping cleaning leads to wrong distributions

Questions to Ask: Are there any columns I should focus on specifically?
Outputs: Histograms and value distributions for key columns
Common Mistakes: Not checking for outliers or unexpected values

Questions to Ask: Which relationships are most important to understand?
Outputs: Correlation matrix and scatter plots showing relationships
Common Mistakes: Missing important correlations by not testing all pairs

Questions to Ask: What format do you prefer for the findings summary?
Outputs: Summary report with key insights and recommendations
Common Mistakes: Not prioritizing findings by business impact

Description: Who will use the dashboard and for what purpose
Questions to Ask: Is this for executives (high-level KPIs) or analysts (detailed breakdowns)? How often will they view it?
Outputs: Clear audience definition and use case
Common Mistakes: Building for wrong audience (too detailed for execs or too simple for analysts)

Description: What metrics matter most to track
Questions to Ask: What are your top 5-7 metrics? Do you have targets for each?
Outputs: Prioritized list of KPIs with targets
Common Mistakes: Too many metrics (7+ KPIs causes cognitive overload)

Questions to Ask: Which tables contain this data? What granularity (daily/weekly)?
Outputs: Clean aggregated data ready for visualization
Common Mistakes: Not validating data before visualization

Questions to Ask: Any chart preferences? Need to support mobile viewing?
Outputs: Chart type selected for each KPI
Common Mistakes: Using pie charts for more than 5 categories

Questions to Ask: Should I follow inverted pyramid (KPIs top trends middle details bottom)?
Common Mistakes: Burying key insights at bottom of page

Description: What are we testing and what do we expect
Questions to Ask: What is the primary metric? What is the minimum detectable effect you care about?
Outputs: Clear null and alternative hypothesis documented
Common Mistakes: Not defining success criteria upfront

Questions to Ask: How long has the test been running? What is baseline conversion rate?
Outputs: Required vs actual sample size comparison
Common Mistakes: Stopping test too early (peeking problem)

Questions to Ask: Were users randomly assigned? Any known issues with test setup?
Common Mistakes: Ignoring Sample Ratio Mismatch (SRM)

Questions to Ask: What confidence level is required (95% or 99%)?
Common Mistakes: Not accounting for multiple comparisons

Description: What does this mean for business
Questions to Ask: Should we roll out, iterate, or abandon based on results?
Common Mistakes: Declaring winner without considering practical significance

Description: How to group users for analysis
Questions to Ask: Should I cohort by signup date, first purchase, or another event?
Common Mistakes: Using wrong cohort definition for the question

Questions to Ask: Should I track retention, revenue, or activity? Over what time periods?
Common Mistakes: Measuring wrong metric for the business question

Description: Clean data and handle nulls before grouping
Questions to Ask: Are user IDs unique? Any null dates?
Tools/Commands: check_duplicates(), handled nulls; Save script to etl/ folder
Common Mistakes: Including null dates in cohort groups

Questions to Ask: Is there a specific date range to analyze?
Tools/Commands: SQL with window functions, pivot tables
Outputs: Cohort table with periods as columns
Common Mistakes: Off-by-one errors in period calculations

Questions to Ask: Any specific cohorts to highlight?
Common Mistakes: Using colors that don't show progression clearly

Questions to Ask: Which cohorts performed best/worst?
Common Mistakes: Not investigating WHY cohorts differ

Description: What are the funnel stages in order
Questions to Ask: What is the first step? What is the final conversion event?
Common Mistakes: Missing steps or having steps out of order

Questions to Ask: Are event names standardized? Any missing sessions?
Tools/Commands: Mapping event names, removing bots; Save script to etl/ folder
Common Mistakes: Counting duplicate events

Description: How many users at each step
Questions to Ask: What time window should I use for the funnel?
Tools/Commands: SQL to count distinct users per step
Common Mistakes: Counting sessions instead of unique users

Questions to Ask: Are there any known issues at specific steps?
Common Mistakes: Comparing non-sequential steps

Questions to Ask: Prefer horizontal bars or funnel shape?
Common Mistakes: Not labeling percentages clearly

Questions to Ask: What lever do you have to improve each step?
Common Mistakes: Focusing on small improvements instead of biggest drop-offs

Questions to Ask: Daily revenue, weekly users, or monthly orders? How far back?
Common Mistakes: Wrong granularity (too granular hides trends or too aggregated misses patterns)

Description: Handle gaps and outliers in time series
Questions to Ask: Missing dates? Extreme outliers?
Tools/Commands: Resampling, outlier detection; Save script to etl/ folder
Common Mistakes: Interpolating missing data incorrectly

Questions to Ask: Any specific date filters? Exclude weekends?
Common Mistakes: Timezone issues in date grouping

Questions to Ask: Is there known seasonality (weekly/monthly/yearly)?
Common Mistakes: Ignoring seasonality when comparing periods

Questions to Ask: Which comparison periods matter most?
Common Mistakes: Comparing incomplete periods

Questions to Ask: Do you need forecasting? What horizon?
Common Mistakes: Overfitting on historical data

Questions to Ask: RFM, behavior, or demographics? What actions should differ by segment?
Common Mistakes: Choosing variables that don't drive different actions

Questions to Ask: What time window for calculating features?
Tools/Commands: SQL or Python for RFM or other features
Common Mistakes: Using raw values instead of normalized scores

Questions to Ask: How many segments should we create?
Common Mistakes: Too many or too few segments

Questions to Ask: Which metrics matter most for describing segments?
Common Mistakes: Not validating segments are actionable

Questions to Ask: Any naming conventions to follow?
Common Mistakes: Generic names that don't inspire action

Questions to Ask: What quality issues are you aware of?
Common Mistakes: Assuming data is clean without checking

Questions to Ask: Can I drop rows with missing data or should I impute?
Common Mistakes: Using wrong imputation strategy (mean for skewed data)

Questions to Ask: What makes a row a duplicate (exact match or by key)?
Common Mistakes: Removing wrong duplicates (losing valid data)

Questions to Ask: Should outliers be removed, capped, or kept?
Common Mistakes: Removing outliers that are valid data points

Questions to Ask: What validation checks should pass?
Common Mistakes: Not comparing before/after statistics

Questions to Ask: Can you give me an example of the desired output format?
Common Mistakes: Assuming you understand without confirming

Questions to Ask: Which database/schema/tables contain this data? Any documentation?
Common Mistakes: Joining wrong tables or using outdated sources

Questions to Ask: None - writing code
Common Mistakes: Not explaining the logic behind complex queries

Questions to Ask: Does the output look correct? Check this sample.
Common Mistakes: Delivering without sanity checking totals

Questions to Ask: Does this answer your question? Any adjustments needed?
Common Mistakes: Not iterating when initial results are wrong

Questions to Ask: What are the most important KPIs for this report? Any targets?
Common Mistakes: Too many KPIs dilute focus

Questions to Ask: What time period should I calculate for?
Common Mistakes: Calculation errors in complex KPIs

Questions to Ask: Compare to last period, last year, or target?
Common Mistakes: Comparing to wrong baseline

Questions to Ask: Prefer table, cards, or dashboard format?
Common Mistakes: Poor formatting reduces readability

Questions to Ask: What threshold triggers a red flag?
Common Mistakes: Not drawing attention to problems
